alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 8:44PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 945 PM MST... At 843 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southwest of Chui-Chu, or 24 miles southwest of Casa Grande, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Freeman, Kaka, Big Horn, and Stanfield. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 133 and 169. AZ Route 347 near mile marker 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County
